[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″ background_color=”#0D1267″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”35px”]

Video Production

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Alata|700|||||||” text_font_size=”22px”]

Webbiit Media is a Film Production company in Benin City with the mission to become one of the fastest-growing film production, media house, powerful talk show, and personal development brands in Africa. We shoot and edit commercials, documentaries, TV shows
and Talent Management.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Alata|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#00208a” text_font_size=”35px” text_orientation=”center”]

Our vision

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Alata|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#00208a” text_font_size=”16px”]

is to have an inspiring community of people drawn from achievers dedicated to helping you improve all aspects of your life. We provide you with practical advice, resources and the motivation to help you realize your full potential. We only see things from the positive aspect of life, no negativity, we believe everyone can be successful, we believe anyone can become anything, we believe in the ordinary man in the street and we want to breach the gap between the rich and the poor.
We challenge ourselves to think differently, to make something out of nothing, to see things differently and to face our fears and then attract the ecosystem of people ready to do the same talking about success stories from science, technology, and business. We only share the inspiring stories that deserve to be told.
We are great thinkers and we present Life-Changing stories from successful people Such as Political Success, Business Success, Inspiration, Motivation, and Short powerful talks. Website: www.webbiit.com

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Services” _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”10px|0px|20px|0px||” saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Title Row” _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://webbiit.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/icon-1@2x.png” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ width=”69%” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” border_radii=”on|25px|25px|25px|25px”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Alata|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#00208a” text_font_size=”16px” header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#00208a”]

CONCEPT

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Actor||||||||” text_font_size=”16px”]

Our team of professional Media Experts at WEBBIIT TECHNOLOGIES Will work with you to create and develop a very great concept. With your target client in mind, we will build a unique visual narration to meet your desired objectives.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Actor||||||||” header_2_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#00208a” hover_enabled=”0″]

PRE-PRODUCTION

We will help you strategise how to execute and carry out and execute your visual concept in such a way that it fulfills your aims and objectives.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://webbiit.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/icon-2@2x.png” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://webbiit.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/icon-3@2x.png” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” hover_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Actor||||||||” header_2_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#00208a” hover_enabled=”0″]

PRODUCTION

Picking up a camera to shoot is the easiest and most amazing part of the production process, only when the ideation and pre-production phases are done properly. We produce your video with precision and tangibility

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://webbiit.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/icon-3@2x.png” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” hover_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Actor||||||||” header_2_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#00208a” hover_enabled=”0″]

Digital Marketing 

 

 

Our team of experienced digital marketing gurus with a proven track record can connect your content to the right people and choice
